title: CLEAROUT OF NICE ORIGINAL SPLIT PARTS

posts.content:
I have a number of items listed below at what I think are rock bottom prices. Will have to charge postage unless you want to collect of course.
1. HELLA fish eye front indicator set (L/R). Slightly marked "chrome" but very very nice £35 SOLD
2. I have two fuel gauges in nice condition, one with fixing bracket one without. £45 and £40
3. Bosch ZV/PAU 4R2 distributor complete £15
4. Lovely condition speedo 4/57 clear needle. Split or beetle? Not sure but very nice £85
5. Rear seat luggage bar complete with the 3 uprights. No end stops. Lovely straight bar. £95
6. Middle seat original grab bar (double and single set) in really nice condition. Sooo rare now. £150
7. Chrome jailbar upright middle piece for 11/13w. Fabulous and polished. VW stamped.£15 SOLD
8. Side window pop out, a bit pitted but nice and working. Including another for free but slightly broken popout in lovely chrome. £10 SOLD
9. SWF metal housing complete for indicator stalk, really good paint and condition. Inc. 2 free housing pieces. £20
10. Fixed side windows glass SEKURIT stamped and in great condition. 5 pieces £60 the lot SOLD
11. Internal light complete with GHE stamped lens cover in fab. condition. None better. £25 (inc free light base, no lens)
12. Mint VW ashtray, model no. GHE 34 732. Not sure which car/bus. £35
13. One front windscreen glass SIGLA stamped. £15 SOLD
14. As new headlight chrome bezels BISEL CROMODO 9AB-903-826-001. Not sure which model(could be bay I guess?) £15
If you want pics please pm me with an email address and I will send, just too many items to put all pics on.

Hi I'll take the pop outs let me have payment details
Regards Mick
Sorry just seen the windscreen glass i'll take that as well please.

Pm sent
First dibs on fuel guage please
Regards
Fish eyes sold, fuel gauges still there, note they are 6v not 12v

13. One front windscreen glass SIGLA stamped. £15

Can I get pics of this? Close ups of the stamping? Needs to be sigla only, not vw sigla

Cheers
It is Sigla and VW logo
